Posts.Title: Worried about white speck on nipple

Posts.Content: Dear Rhia, It is great that you have had the courage to write here. I was lucky and my white spot disappeared quickly, but it is very important that you go get yours checked by a doctor, especially as you've had it a long time and it is painful. Please carry on with this courage and go get it seen. No questions are silly in what health is concerned. If it's something small, you'll get it out of your way. If it's important, you will finally start getting treatment for it. Either way you will be better off by going to the doc, plus you will have the peace of mind. Feel free to comment here at any point. We are supporting you. Hugs, Gèni
Posts.Title: Worried about white speck on nipple

Posts.Content: Hi Louise, What happened in the end? I seem to have the same thing. Hope you're well. Thanks.
Posts.Title: Worried about white speck on nipple

Posts.Content: I think it was a couple of weeks. But as the other person above mentioned, if it's not gone in 3 weeks then go see your doctor. I think mine was a little ball of grease that got reabsorbed by the body. Good luck and don't stress too much.
